attributes.action: Sort out the benefit claims procedure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have put in a claim for Jobseekers Allowance as a joint claim with my partner and so far am only recieving £120 per fortnight for both of us. when my partner phoned up to find out when the joint claim will be sorted, she was told no record was on file and then told i was getting extra money for my partner which my allowance has not changed and now i have council tax bill for £701.69p to pay and i have claimed council tax benefits also
